text: illeogalodoe jinliga hananim-eu lobuteo ileuleoss-euni wonhaneun jalo hayeogeum midge hal geos-iyo geuleohji a nihan ja bulsintolog dula hananim-eun geu bulsinjadeul-eul wihayeo yeongiwa hwa yeom-i ewo ssaneun buljiog-eul junbiha yeossnola ttohan geudeul-i mul-eul guhana geudeul-ui eolgul-eul taeul nog-eun hwangdongbulgat-eun mul-i bueojilini geu eumlyosuwa geojujineun jeojuseuleoun geos-ila
